operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO users (first_name, last_name, access_hash, username, phone, country_code, bio, about, is_bot) VALUES (:first_name, :last_name, :access_hash, :username, :phone, :country_code, :bio, :about, :is_bot)

operation.name: SelectByPhoneNumber
operation.sql: SELECT id, access_hash, first_name, last_name, username, banned, photos FROM users WHERE phone=:phone LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectById
operation.sql: SELECT id, access_hash, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photos FROM users WHERE id=:id LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectUsersByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, access_hash, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photos FROM users WHERE id IN (:id_list)

operation.name: SelectUsersByPhoneList
operation.sql: SELECT id, access_hash, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photos FROM users WHERE phone IN (:phoneList)

operation.name: SelectByQueryString
operation.sql: SELECT id, access_hash, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photos FROM users WHERE username = :username OR first_name = :first_name OR last_name = :last_name OR phone = :phone limit 20

operation.name: SearchByQueryNotIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM users WHERE username LIKE :q2 AND id NOT IN(:id_list) LIMIT :limit

operation.name: Banned
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET banned=:banned, banned_reason=:banned_reason, banned_at=:banned_at WHERE id=:id

operation.name: Delete
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET deleted=1, deleted_reason=:deleted_reason, deleted_at=:deleted_at WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateUsername
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET username=:username WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateFirstAndLastName
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET first_name = :first_name, last_name = :last_name WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAbout
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateProfile
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET first_name = :first_name, last_name = :last_name, about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectByUsername
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM users WHERE username=:username LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectAccountDaysTTL
operation.sql: SELECT account_days_ttl FROM users WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAccountDaysTTL
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET account_days_ttl = :account_days_ttl WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectProfilePhotos
operation.sql: SELECT photos FROM users WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectCountryCode
operation.sql: SELECT country_code FROM users WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateProfilePhotos
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET photos = :photos WHERE id=:id
